catalog_info.description: From the history to the mechanics, this course will explore the origins of graphic novels and how to apply this medium in literary and artistic ways. Classes will include presentations and lectures on important historical and current work as well as practical assignments. For students interested in acquiring an understanding of cartooning history as well as those interested in developing their own work for publication, this course will provide a strong foundation.
